title: Hyperkit industrial engraving minimalist sans
content: saw this on Hyperkit site. Looks like Lineto's Gravur but "a" if different, What is it? ![sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415015959im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69903.jpg)
author: designalchemy

comments.content:
I would like to claim and pretend that this could as well be handmade / custom..   
_( Especially since its a typeface for a design bureau and its 'just' a simple, plain, geometric, constructed oneline font, with no difference in contrast.. )_
